# currentItem

**Instance Property**

The player’s current item.

## Declaration

```swift
var currentItem: WKAudioFilePlayerItem? { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is set at initialization time.

## Getting Information About the Player

- **status**: The status of the player.
- **error**: An error that describes the cause of a failure.

items.description: An error that describes the cause of a failure.
items.name: error
